films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community...

films.title: Inception
films.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

films.title: The Dark Knight
films.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

films.title: Forrest Gump
films.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of a man with a low IQ.

films.title: Titanic
films.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

films.title: The Godfather
films.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in tales of violence and redemption.

films.title: Fight Club
films.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

films.title: The Matrix
films.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

films.title: Interstellar
films.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

films.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
films.description: Peter Parker seeks the help of Doctor Strange when his identity is revealed to the world, unleashing a multiverse of madness.
